title: Triad Securities Adds Industry Veterans to Sales Team To Service Growing Demand for Prime Brokerage
text:
Full service brokerage firm announces three new hires that will help to further support clients and address the growing demand for prime brokerage services.
New York City, New York (PRWEB) September 24, 2015
Triad Securities Corp , a full service brokerage firm, announced today the appointment of three industry veterans to leadership roles on the firm’s expanding sales team. Brandi Gatlin has joined the firm as director of institutional sales and trading, Scott Daspin has joined as director of prime brokerage sales, and Kevin Heal joins as director of fixed income sales. With decades of experience in senior management positions, these new executives will help Triad respond to unprecedented demand for prime brokerage services.
“Triad is continuing to expand its market share in the hedge fund clearing business and clients find the value in our unique model for consensus calls on IPOs and secondaries,” said Larry Goldsmith, President of Triad Securities. “Brandi, Scott and Kevin will be fantastic additions to our team as they work to develop the largest group of new clients Triad has seen in two decades of offering prime services.”
With fully staffed operations and trading areas, Triad is one of few brokerages that has the resources to offer personalized service to emerging managers.
Ms. Gatlin joins Triad with 15 years of equity research sales and trading experience, most recently as Senior Vice President for Institutional Sales at MLV & Co.. She has also held senior positions at Merriman Capital, WJB Capital Group and A.G. Edward & Sons.
Mr. Daspin comes to Triad with two decades of electronic trading experience, including the development of global trading algorithms and strategies. He was most recently at ConvergEx as managing director and head of electronic sales.
Mr. Heal joins Triad with 25 years of experience in fixed income sales, most recently as Vice President of Business Development and Advisory at Callahan & Associates. He has also served in senior leadership roles at Cohen & Company and BNP Paribas.
About Triad Corp.
Triad Securities Corp was founded in 1976 as a full-service agency only discount brokerage firm. With corporate headquarters in the Wall Street area of New York City and access to a full service execution desk at an affiliated broker-dealer in London, Triad is meeting the needs of a world-wide trading environment. For more information, visit http://www.triadsecurities.com
